SEARCH
Package squire.complex

Class ComplexMatrix

java.lang.Object
squire.complex.ComplexMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
CircuitModifier, CombinableCircuitModifier
public class ComplexMatrix extends Object implements CombinableCircuitModifier
Represents a matrix of complex numbers. With the gracious assistance of ChatGPT.

    • apply

      public StateVector apply(StateVector state)
      Description copied from interface: CircuitModifier
      Applies the circuit modification to the given quantum state vector. Implementing classes must define the specific transformation applied to the state vector. The modification is applied directly to the provided state vector without modifying its internal state.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface CircuitModifier
      Parameters:
      state - The quantum state vector to which the circuit modification is applied.
      Returns:
      The resulting quantum state vector after applying the circuit modification.

    • combine

      public CircuitModifier combine(CombinableCircuitModifier c)
      Description copied from interface: CombinableCircuitModifier
      Combines this combinable circuit modifier with another combinable circuit modifier. Implementing classes must define the specific rules for combination with another modifier. The resulting modifier should incorporate the combined effect of both modifiers.
      Specified by:
      combine in interface CombinableCircuitModifier
      Parameters:
      c - The combinable circuit modifier to be combined with this modifier.
      Returns:
      A new circuit modifier representing the combination of this and the provided modifier.

    • asMatrix

      public ComplexMatrix asMatrix()
      Description copied from interface: CombinableCircuitModifier
      Converts this combinable circuit modifier into a complex matrix representation. Implementing classes must define how the modification is represented as a complex matrix. The resulting matrix should capture the transformation applied by this circuit modifier.
      Specified by:
      asMatrix in interface CombinableCircuitModifier
      Returns:
      The complex matrix representation of this combinable circuit modifier.
